website_summaries.verdict: The designers of KEEN gave hikers a new choice when it comes to exploring the outdoors. The Axis Evo Mid wears a sneaker-like facade, yet it also carries the support of a hiking boot. These attributes are packed in a lightweight build. Add to that is its provision of immediate comfort and grippy ride. However, its fit seems to be amiss.Overall, the pros of the KEEN Axis Evo Mid appeal more to narrow-footed wearers. They must be willing to size down though.
pros: The majority praised the KEEN Axis Evo Mid for its lightness
The hybrid design of this hiking boot pleased a handful of owners
One even exclaimed that he was stoked with its part boot, part sneaker
Plenty of hikers stated that it was comfortable straight out of the box
Despite the low profile lug design, it was still able to provide adequate grip on a variety of ground surfaces, as declared by an impressed wearer
Some users were dumbfounded with the cozy confines of the Axis Evo Mid from KEEN
They noted that they did not get any blisters at all
It rendered sufficient ankle support, based on a consumer review
A big chunk of owners were satisfied with its performance
They added that they would recommend it to their friends
cons: A couple of irked online buyers commented that the Axis Evo Mid had a restrictive fit
Its tightening system is lacking, as observed by a few

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who wears a size thirteen. They fit perfectly, are extremely comfortable and look outstanding. His only complaint is the new trend of eliminating the tongue which makes them harder to get on but still a good purchase. He doesn’t hike and wears them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L Todd

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable for long work days
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazingly comfortable. I work 12 plus hours a day walking on cement and such within a prison. Truly the most comfortable pair of boots I gave ever owned
customer_reviews.author: tjw8

customer_reviews.title: Loved my first pair so much I bought a second in a different color.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as expected and are extremely comfortable to wear. It is almost like wearing a pair of slippers yet they surprisingly give my foot enough support that I have no problems when I go on hikes. I enjoyed my first pair so much that I bought a second pair in a different color. I would definitely recommend these to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHOE EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes in my 37 years of life! I hate wearing shoes in general. They are the last thing I put on and the first thing I take off. But, these!!!! Man, I put them on early in the morning, walk around inside & out all day, and am a wee bit sad when I take them off. Changed out the laces for no tie zips, fit like a sock with rubber soles!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Herr

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice but not for summer
customer_reviews.text: By looking at the pic you may think this is a full knit upper boot for summer. No! it has some padding inside so good for spring or autumn? It is about 14 degrees now in Canada and feels perfect. Back to boots. Feels awesome and the insole. The insole is MUCH better than many many other brands. No need break-in, no pain 1st day with this boot N' walk for about 4 hours. Still, some breathability keeps my feet dry. Super comfortable N loves it.
customer_reviews.author: qiu

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: Love the ankle support and they are nice and light.
customer_reviews.author: Trego Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great light hiker
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy on. Looks great. It was between these and the Merrell light hiker with BOA closure system. These were hands down more comfortable. Would have liked the bootie collar to be more snug around my ankles, but I have really skinny ankles, so I would expect if they were made to fit me snug, someone with thicker ankles would be disappointed about how tight they were.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes felt comfortable right out of the box. Easy on, off... excellent light hiking shoes. Very quick shipment
customer_reviews.author: kevin randy collins

customer_reviews.title: Right choice
customer_reviews.text: these hiking boots are perfect for intermediate difficulty / hiking trails . comfortable, light and breathable.. just hike and enjoy
customer_reviews.author: aquila

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this product. They fit nice and feel comfortable. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Cektore

product_meta.title: KEEN Targhee Evo Mid Shoes Men Olive Night/Marigold 2019
product_meta.description: With a contoured fit for better agility and an EVOFIT engineered knit upper, this progressive hiking boot soars through every landscape with an aggressive outsole and a lightweight, breathable design. Product specific size information: Size runs small Additional Information: - 4mm multidirectional cleats for best traction - ESS shaft offers light support - Cleansport NXT for natural odour control Fit: Normal Surface coating: PU Outdoor Shoes Application: Hiking Type: Mid Cut Shoes Materials Inner lining: Breathable Mesh Sole Type: Rubber Middle sole: EVA midsole for light cushioning Sole: KEEN All-Terrain for high traction Inner lining type: Textile Over material Type: Mesh Shoe Features Features: Transport loops Footbed: Removable insole Closing system: Shoe laces Crampons: Not crampon-fixed
feature_bullets: The KEEN® Targhee EVO Mid hiking boot has a contoured fit and a breathable construction so you stay agile and comfortable on any terrain.
EVOFIT engineered knit upper for adaptive comfort.
Interior treated with Cleansport NXT™ for natural odor control for a fresher foot environment.
Lace-up closure style for a more secure fit.

Engineered dynamic stretch collar sleeve.nRemovable, dual-density EVA footbed with arch support provides superior underfoot comfort. nEVA midsole for lightweight cushioning and shock absorption. nExternal stability shank delivers lightweight support. nKEEN.ALL-TERRAIN rubber outsole with 4mm multi-directional lugs provide higher-traction grip. nImported.nMeasurements:nn Weight: 1 lb 2 ozn nnProduct measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium
